Name: require_project_status_active
Description: Only consider projects with active status

Name: require_feature_status_completed
Description: Only completed features contribute to goals

Name: require_user_story_status_done
Description: Only done user stories are counted

Name: require_task_status_not_blocked
Description: Tasks must not be blocked by any blocker

Name: require_skill_certified
Description: Only certified skills are valid for assignment

Name: require_role_area_defined
Description: Role must have defined area of responsibility

Name: require_velocity_above_minimum
Description: Team velocity must exceed minimum threshold

Name: require_board_updated_recently
Description: Scrum board must be updated within last 24h

Name: require_snapshot_test_passed
Description: Only snapshots with passed tests are valid

Name: require_goal_achievement_met
Description: Sprint goal must be fully achieved
